unavailable_content: Not available in current game version
multitab_warning: Warning: you have Evolve running in multiple tabs, which can cause loss of save data. Run the game in one tab at a time only.
backup_warning: Have you Exported your save data recently? Making regular backups of your game data prevents permanent loss of progress in the event your browser cache is cleared.
settings1: Enable Control (10x) / Shift (25x) / Alt (100x) Multiplier keys
settings3: A hard reset will permanently erase all your game progress. This resets everything as if you never played.
settings4: A soft reset will reset your current run back to the evolution stage. You will not gain any bonuses. This only wipes out the current run; your previous progress is retained.
settings8: Expose read-only game data to window object for debugging. May degrade game performance. The author of Evolve does not endorse using this for anything, including scripting, or provide any additional support for it. Use at your own risk.
settings9: Restore game back to your last restore point. A restore point is generated automatically before each prestige reset.
settings10: Opt out of Special Events. This does not include standard game events, only special events that occur on holidays or other occasions. You will miss out on game feats, fun, and potential rewards.
settings11: Pre-Load all tab content into the DOM. This bloats the game, will significantly increase memory consumption, and will degrade performance.
settings13: Enable use of String Packs, imported .txt files that rewrite the strings in the game to give it a different look and feel.
settings14: Do not enforce research queue order
settings15: How the Building Queue manages merging similar items in the queue. It can merge similar items if they're nearby each other in the queue, regardless of where they are in the queue, or never merge them at all.
settings17: Always power on new structures, even when remaining electricity or support is insufficient.
reset_warn: Warning: This completely resets all your progress and cannot be undone. This is NOT a prestige mechanic; you are wiping out your game data. Keep this button disabled.
string_example: String pack files must be formatted as valid JSON. See github strings.json file for a complete list of all keys and default strings. The file must be formatted like this: %0
restore_warning: Are you sure you want to Restore Backup? This will load a backup save that was saved to your browser's local storage right before the last time you prestiged. If no save is found, this option will not do anything.

job_farmer_desc: Farmers create %1 to feed your population. Each farmer generates %0 %1 per second. Farmers in excess of the %2 Farms constructed generate only %3 %1 per second.
job_farmer_desc_hp: Farmers create %1 to feed your population. Each farmer generates %0 %1 per second. Each Farm supports %2 Farmers, so extra farmers above %4 generate only %3 %1 per second.
job_lumberjack_desc: Lumberjacks harvest %1 from the forests. Each lumberjack generates %0 %1 per second.
job_reclaimer_desc: Reclaimers scavenge for dead things. Each reclaimer generates %0 bones and %1 flesh per second.
job_reclaimer_desc2: Reclaimers scavenge for dead things. Each reclaimer generates %0 bones per second.
job_quarry_worker_desc1: Quarry Workers mine %1 from quarries. Each quarry worker generates %0 %1 per second.
job_quarry_worker_desc2: Quarry Workers mine %1 and %2 from quarries. Each quarry worker generates %0 %1 per second.
job_quarry_worker_smoldering: Quarry Workers can alternatively be tasked with mining %0.
job_crystal_miner_desc: Crystal miners carefully extract crystals from the ground to be used in magic artifacts. It is a delicate process that requires dedicated workers. Each crystal miner generates %0 %1 per second.
job_scavenger_desc: Scavengers search the trash heaps of %0 looking for anything useful. Boosts production by %1%.
job_torturer_desc: Tormentors torment captives to break their minds and convert them into thralls. They also oversee the thralls to keep them in line.
job_teamster_desc: Teamsters are responsible for moving freight around. The more production you have, the more teamsters you need to meet the logistical needs of your civilization. You currently need %0 teamsters.
job_meditator_desc: Meditators seek solace in a life without sustenance and can inspire others to grow and survive. Raises population growth and lowers starvation.
job_miner_desc1: Miners dig up useful minerals from shafts dug deep in the ground. Each miner will extract copper from the ground.
job_miner_desc2: Miners dig up useful minerals from shafts dug deep in the ground. Each miner will extract copper and iron from the ground.
job_miner_desc2_amber: Miners dig up useful minerals from shafts dug deep in the ground. Each miner will extract copper, iron, and aluminium from the ground.
job_coal_miner_desc1: Coal miners are a special breed of miner, willing to work the dirtiest of mines to extract coal from deep in the ground.
job_coal_miner_desc2: Coal miners are a special breed of miner, willing to work the dirtiest of mines to extract coal and uranium from deep in the ground.
job_craftsman_desc: Crafters can be assigned to craft various construction materials out of raw materials.
job_craftsman_hover: Crafters will work diligently to produce the assigned resources.
job_cement_worker_desc: Cement Workers turn stone into cement. Each worker produces %0 cement and consumes %1 stone per second.
job_cement_worker_amber_desc: Cement Workers mix amber with minerals to create cement. Each worker produces %0 cement and consumes 3 amber per second.
job_banker_desc: Bankers manage your banks, increasing tax revenue. Each banker increases tax income by %0%.
job_banker_desc_fasting: Bankers manage your banks, starving bankers do not increase tax income.
job_entertainer_desc: Entertainers help combat the dreariness of everyday life. Each entertainer raises the morale of your citizens by %0%.
job_entertainer_desc2: Entertainers help combat the dreariness of everyday life. Each entertainer raises the morale of your citizens by %0% and your max morale by %1%.
job_priest_desc: Priests boost the effectiveness of temples.
job_priest_desc2: Priests boost the effectiveness of temples and Ziggurats.
job_priest_desc3: Priests also generate small amounts of Mana.
job_pofficer_desc: Political Officers boost the effectiveness of Propaganda Centers.
job_professor_desc: Professors help educate your citizens and contribute to knowledge gain. Each professor generates %0 knowledge per second.
job_scientist_desc: Scientists study the universe to expose its secrets. Each scientist generates %0 knowledge per second.
job_wizard_desc: Wizards study the magical properties of the universe to expose its secrets. Each wizard generates %0 Knowledge and %1 Mana per second.
job_colonist_desc: Colonists work hard to keep your %0 colony running smoothly and enhance various aspects of the colony.
job_colonist_desc_tp: %0 Colonists work hard to keep your %0 colony running smoothly and enhance various aspects of the colony.
job_space_miner_desc: Space miners work in zero G mining asteroids. Each Space Miner increases the maximum number of mining ships that can be operated by 1.
job_hell_surveyor_desc: Surveyors are tasked with scouting the Hell dimension for Infernite. Workers are routinely killed by demonic creatures and must be protected by patrols. This is pretty much the worst job in the empire.
job_archaeologist_desc: Archaeologists dig through ancient city dig sites looking for lost knowledge. Each archaeologist increases max knowledge by %0.
job_ghost_trapper_desc: Ghost Trappers roam the Asphodel Meadows and use advanced technology to capture lazy spirits. The spirits are then sent to the %0 to be turned into %1. Captures %2 to %3 souls per day.
job_elysium_miner_desc: A miner specialized in extracting valuable materials from the depths of the %0.
job_pit_miner_desc: Pit Miners work hard to extract resources from %0.
job_crew_desc: Ships often require crew members to operate.
job_unemployed_desc: The number of unemployed citizens. Unemployed citizens lower morale and do not pay taxes. However, they also consume half rations.
job_hunter_desc: Citizens not assigned to any other task will hunt for %0. Military technology will boost effectiveness.
job_evil_hunter_desc: Demons not assigned to any other task will hunt mortals for their %0, %1, and %2. Military technology will boost effectiveness.
job_not_evil_hunter_desc: Citizens not assigned to any other task will hunt for %0, %1, and %2. Military technology will boost effectiveness.
job_art_hunter_desc: Citizens not assigned to any other task will hunt for %0. Military technology will boost effectiveness.
job_art_demon_hunter_desc: Demons not assigned to any other task will hunt mortals for their %0 and %1. Military technology will boost effectiveness.
job_eld_hunter_desc: Citizens not assigned to any other task will raid the surface to capture surface dwellers and other resources.
job_forager_desc: Foragers roam the land looking for anything useful, primarily anything edible. They find enough food to feed themselves and bring in extra food and other supplies, but are not very efficient.

evo_dna_desc: Creates a new strand of DNA
evo_nucleus_effect: Automatically consume 2 RNA to create %0 DNA.
evo_mitochondria_effect: Increases the effect of membranes and eukaryotic cells.
evo_phagocytosis_effect: Evolve in the direction of the animal kingdom. This is a major evolutionary fork.
evo_chloroplasts_effect: Evolve in the direction of the plant kingdom. This is a major evolutionary fork.
evo_chitin_effect: Evolve in the direction of the fungi kingdom. This is a major evolutionary fork.
evo_exterminate_effect: Sanitize organic matter sample to prevent contamination of machine parts. This ends evolution.
evo_multicellular_effect: Decreases cost of producing new nucleus.
evo_athropods_effect: Evolve in the direction of arthropods. This is an evolutionary fork.
evo_mammals_effect: Evolve in the direction of mammals. This is an evolutionary fork.
evo_humanoid_effect: Evolve in the direction of humanoids. This is an evolutionary fork.
evo_gigantism_effect: Evolve in the direction of gigantism. This is an evolutionary fork.
evo_dwarfism_effect: Evolve in the direction of dwarfism. This is an evolutionary fork.
evo_animalism_effect: Evolve in the direction of beasts. This is an evolutionary fork.
evo_carnivore_effect: Evolve in the direction of carnivorous beasts. This is an evolutionary fork.
evo_herbivore_effect: Evolve in the direction of herbivorous beasts. This is an evolutionary fork.
evo_omnivore_effect: Evolve in the direction of omnivorous beasts. This is an evolutionary fork.
evo_demonic_effect: Evolve in the direction of demons. This is an evolutionary fork.
evo_eldritch_effect: Evolve in the direction of Eldritch horrors. This is an evolutionary fork.
evo_celestial_effect: Evolve in the direction of celestials. This is an evolutionary fork.
evo_eggshell_effect: Evolve in the direction of eggshells. This is an evolutionary fork.
evo_endothermic_effect: Evolve in the direction of avians. This is an evolutionary fork.
evo_ectothermic_effect: Evolve in the direction of reptiles. This is an evolutionary fork.

evo_aquatic_effect: Evolve in the direction of marine life. This is an evolutionary fork.
evo_fey_effect: Evolve in the direction of fey. This is an evolutionary fork.
evo_heat_effect: Evolve in the direction of heat-resistant life. This is an evolutionary fork.
evo_polar_effect: Evolve in the direction of cold-resistant life. This is an evolutionary fork.
evo_sand_effect: Evolve in the direction of desert life. This is an evolutionary fork.
evo_synthetic_effect: Evolve in the direction of synthetic life. This is an evolutionary fork.
evo_sentience_effect: Complete your evolution by evolving into a species which has achieved sentience.
evo_sentience_ai_effect: Use a random number generator to design your synthetic race.
evo_pick_race: Evolve into a %0. This completes evolution.
evo_bunker_flair: Set down the path of Bunker
evo_challenge: Opens the challenge mode gene pool
evo_challenge_genes_desc: Each Challenge Gene activated increases the quality of achievements earned.
evo_challenge_genes_mastery: Higher-quality achievements are worth more mastery.
evo_challenge_run_desc: Challenge modes are game runs with special rules; each challenge is unique and has its own conditions and reward.
evo_scenario_desc: Scenarios are games that have special starting conditions. Scenarios always enforce max difficulty and may significantly change gameplay. Scenarios cannot be combined.
evo_challenge_mastery_effect: Mastery is much weaker than normal.
evo_challenge_trade_effect: No marketplace trading. (Trade routes are still enabled.)
evo_challenge_crispr_effect: Gain a random negative mutation. CRISPR cost creep discounts function at only 20%.
evo_challenge_nerfed_effect: Mastery is reduced to %0, and plasmid and anti-plasmid production are reduced to %1 value. Plasmid and anti-plasmid storage bonus reduced to %2. Phage storage bonus reduced to %3.
evo_challenge_badgenes_effect: Gain %0 random empowered negative trait and %1 weak negative traits.
evo_challenge_junker_desc: You're a genetic disaster, and inherit nothing but terrible traits from virtually every other race.
evo_challenge_junker_effect: This forces on all four challenge genes. You will be stacked with horrible junk traits. Reach MAD for a special perk.
evo_challenge_junker_conditions: MAD reset to win the challenge.
evo_challenge_scenario_warn: Warning: you have low Mastery. This Scenario is not recommended at this time!
evo_challenge_scenario_failwarn: This challenge can end in total failure.
evo_challenge_cataclysm_desc: A cataclysm has destroyed your homeworld. You must survive without terrestrial resources.
evo_challenge_cataclysm_effect: A massive earthquake has literally shaken your planet apart. Start with a space colony but no homeworld. Escape to a new world to win (Bioseed).
evo_challenge_cataclysm_warn: This scenario is very slow-paced. Not recommended for players with low prestige rewards.
evo_challenge_cataclysm_conditions: Bioseed or Cataclysm reset to win the challenge.
evo_challenge_joyless_effect: There will be no joy in your life: entertainers and broadcasting are disabled. Construct a Biodome to earn the achievement and remove the penalty.
evo_challenge_joyless_flair: There is no joy in this life
evo_challenge_joyless_conditions: Construct a Biodome to complete the challenge.
evo_challenge_steelen_effect: Your species cannot figure out how to smelt Steel. You have to resort to other means to get any of it. Have the mettle to Bioseed with this challenge active and your dedication will be rewarded.
evo_challenge_steelen_conditions: Bioseed reset to complete the challenge.
evo_challenge_decay_desc: All matter in this universe is unstable and decays.
evo_challenge_decay_effect: Resources decay at a rate determined by how much of it you are storing. Larger stores decay quicker. Destroy this universe to end the cycle of decay.
evo_challenge_decay_flair: Decayed, but not forgotten. Who am I kidding? No one will remember you.
evo_challenge_decay_conditions: Blackhole reset to complete the challenge.
evo_challenge_banana_desc: Your economy is dependent on a single export.
evo_challenge_banana_effect: You can only export one type of resource, your economy is bad, and your army is weak. Complete a checklist of objectives; unifying exits the scenario.
evo_challenge_truepath_recap: You are progressing on an alternate path of reality.
evo_challenge_emfield_effect: Energy costs are higher and technology may fail you. You must ascend to win.
evo_challenge_emfield_conditions: Ascend reset to complete the challenge.
evo_challenge_inflation_desc: Prices are climbing out of control.
evo_challenge_inflation_effect: Inflation is ruining your economy. The more you build, the more worthless your money becomes. Constructing anything devalues money, causing all money costs to increase.
evo_challenge_inflation_conditions: Acquire two hundred fifty billion worthless dollars.
evo_challenge_sludge_desc: You're a failed experiment; gain lots of awful traits and suffer terribly.
evo_challenge_sludge_effect: You will be stacked with terrible junk traits. You suffer for no reason.
evo_challenge_ultra_sludge_desc: You're an even worse failed experiment; gain lots of dreadful traits and suffer terribly.
evo_challenge_ultra_sludge_effect: You will be stacked with terrible junk traits. You suffer because the community wanted it.
evo_challenge_ultra_sludge_flair: Win? If you can call it that.
evo_challenge_fasting_desc: Your citizens can not eat food.
evo_challenge_fasting_effect: Food production is disabled. Learn to survive without sustenance.
evo_challenge_fasting_flair: I have no mouth and I must eat.
evo_challenge_orbit_decay_desc: The moon is in a decaying orbit.
evo_challenge_orbit_decay_impacted: The moon has collided with %0, destroying both.
evo_challenge_orbit_decay_effect: Your homeworlds' moon is in a decaying orbit; it will impact the planet in %0 days.
evo_challenge_orbit_decay_flair: Why is the moon getting bigger?
evo_challenge_orbit_decayed_msg: The moon has fallen into %0 and destroyed all life on the planet.
evo_challenge_orbit_decayed_accelerated: The Moon's orbit decay has suddenly accelerated; you have %0 days remaining.

witch_hunter_warning: Witch Hunters have been spotted in the city. Keep your activities hidden.
