tech_devilish_dish_effect: The Codex Infernium holds secrets for a forbidden dish; the pull is irresistible.
tech_hell_oven_effect: Develop a structure capable of withstanding the intense heat required to make the Devilish Dish.
tech_preparation_methods_effect: The Codex Infinium holds information about advanced methods to speed up the creation of the Devilish Dish.
tech_final_ingredient_effect: Now for the last step. You will sacrifice everything to taste this dish.
tech_bioscience_effect: Begin unlocking the mysteries of life.
tech_genetics_effect: Begin unlocking the secrets of DNA.
tech_crispr_effect: CRISPR is a breakthrough in genetic engineering that will allow you to permanently modify your own genome.
tech_crispr_effect_artifical: CRISPR is a breakthrough in code engineering that will allow you to permanently modify your own source code.
tech_shotgun_sequencing_effect: Unlock a faster brute-force method of genome sequencing.
tech_shotgun_sequencing_effect_artifical: Unlock a faster method of developing code patches to modify your source code.
tech_de_novo_sequencing_effect: Unlock an option to produce genetic material from excess knowledge.
tech_de_novo_sequencing_effect_artifical: Unlock an option to produce code patches from excess knowledge.
tech_dna_sequencer_effect: Automatically convert excess knowledge into Genes once per day if knowledge is capped.
tech_code_sequencer_effect: Automatically convert excess knowledge into Programs once per day if knowledge is capped.
tech_rapid_sequencing_effect: DNA Sequencer automatically converts excess knowledge into Genes up to 5 times per day.
tech_agile_development_effect: Agile Development automatically converts excess knowledge into buggy Programs up to 5 times per day.
tech_mad_science_effect: The greatest leaps in science are often made by "misunderstood" individuals.
tech_sages_effect: Wizard sages with special laboratories will unlock the secrets of the universe.
tech_electricity_msg: Electricity is a major advancement for your people; the future possibilities are endless.
tech_industrialization_effect: Bring about the industrial revolution. Leads to all sorts of new technological developments.
tech_electronics_effect: Electronics is the next major step forward in technological advancement.
tech_fission_effect: Learn to split the atom, a powerful but terrifying new development.
tech_fission_msg: Your scientists have unlocked the secrets of the atom. The atomic age has begun.
tech_arpa_effect: Establish the Advanced Research Projects Agency (A.R.P.A.). This advanced laboratory is dedicated to providing the facilities to progress all your special projects.
tech_rocketry_effect: Establish the field of rocketry. Leads to all sorts of new ballistic technologies.
tech_robotics_effect: New breakthroughs in robotics could lead to new technologies that increase productivity.
tech_lasers_desc: Light Amplification by Stimulated Emission of Radiation
tech_lasers_effect: Laser technology finally made practical. This could lead to all sorts of new breakthroughs.
tech_artificial_intelligence_effect: SciFi says this isn't a good idea, but what do a bunch of self-important SciFi writers know?
tech_artificial_intelligence_flair: When the testing is over, you will be missed.
tech_quantum_computing_effect: Quantum computing is a great leap forwards in processing power.
tech_quantum_computing_flair: It's as cool as it sounds.
tech_virtual_reality_effect: Create virtual worlds indistinguishable from reality. Has potential applications ranging from training simulators to entertainment.
tech_virtual_reality_flair: How do you know what's real anymore?
tech_plasma_effect: Burning hot plasma beams can melt through anything in record time. Has obvious military applications, but could also be useful to mining operations.
tech_shields_effect: Although the power requirements are quite harsh, the ability to manipulate energy fields into "shields" which repulse unwanted particles could be extremely powerful.
tech_ai_core_effect: An advanced AI Core tasked with optimizing your empire could be significantly beneficial.
tech_metaphysics_effect: Begin to unlock a deep understanding of the secrets of the supernatural.
tech_orichalcum_analysis_effect: Analyze the Orichalcum's properties to find out why the aliens are obsessed with it.
tech_orichalcum_analysis_result: Pure Orichalcum is a room-temperature superconductor! The potential applications are nearly limitless.
tech_cybernetics_effect: Huge advances can be made in the field of cybernetics thanks to knowledge learned in the Codex Infernium.
tech_divinity_effect: Collate the knowledge of the ancients to learn how to manipulate divine energy.
tech_blood_pact_effect: Find uses for the Blood Stones being found in the spire.
tech_purify_effect: Enhance your purifiers to better dispel the miasma.
tech_waygate_effect: Research how to construct a Waygate to reach the lord of hell.
tech_demonic_infusion_effect: Sacrifice your civilization to infuse yourself with demonic power and become a Lord of Hell.
tech_purify_essence_effect: Wash away the evil contained in the Demonic Essence.
tech_purify_essence_warn: Taking this action blocks the Demonic Infusion route.
tech_gate_key_effect: The key to opening the gate seems to be to construct two large towers outside the gate, which power its mechanisms to open. You must draw up blueprints to construct these devices.
tech_gate_turret_effect: Install turrets to help secure the gate region.
tech_infernite_mine_effect: High levels of Infernite have been detected near the gate region. Survey the area for the best place to construct a mine.
tech_study_corrupt_gem_effect: Study the unusual gem to learn its secrets.
tech_study_corrupt_gem_result: You learn much about the hell dimension, including the location of a lost city.
tech_corrupt_gem_analysis_effect: Analyze the Corrupt Soul Gem to unlock its secrets.
tech_corrupt_gem_analysis_result: A scientist went insane and died in a violent altercation after touching the Corrupt Gem; however, his babbling may have revealed a new location in the Hell Dimension.
tech_soul_binding_effect: Knowledge from the gem permeates your mind, teaching you a forbidden ritual to ascend to godhood.
tech_soul_capacitor_effect: In order to ascend, you must store up a huge amount of spirit energy. This device will allow you to store the spirit energy of the damned.
tech_absorption_chamber_effect: A special chamber will be necessary to absorb the spirit energy and ascend.
tech_hell_search_effect: Send a fleet of Sensor Drones to search the hell coordinates revealed by the Corrupted Soul Gem.
tech_hell_search_result: You have discovered what looks like the ruins of an ancient city!
tech_codex_infernium_effect: Study the Codex Infernium to unlock its secrets.
tech_lake_analysis_effect: Study the lake's properties to learn how best to cross it.
tech_lake_analysis_fasting: The extreme temperatures of the lake seem to be the best environment to create the Devilish Dish.
tech_lake_threat_effect: Sea monsters have been observed in the hell lake; how they can survive is a mystery, but we need to study this threat and develop a counter for it.
tech_lake_threat_result: Traditional outboard engines won't survive the high temperatures of the boiling lake. Your engineers have designed a motorized Bireme military vessel for use in the lake.
tech_lake_transport_effect: You need to design a cargo vessel to move supplies across the lake.
tech_cooling_tower_effect: It takes a lot of power to keep the Harbors cool on the boiling lake; special cooling towers could drastically reduce this power cost.
tech_miasma_effect: Develop protection from the deadly miasma so you can explore the spire island.
tech_incorporeal_effect: Study a new field of science that posits it is possible for life to exist as pure energy in an incorporeal state.
tech_ascension_effect: Your scientists think they have cracked the secrets of the universe and might be able to shed their mortal bodies to become beings of pure energy. Further testing is required.
tech_dimensional_tap_effect: Establish a connection between the ascension machine and your edenic encampments. Directly tapping into the higher dimension will surely be beneficial.
tech_terraforming_effect: Planetary-scale Terraforming is a radical attempt to change a less desirable planet into one more like your homeworld. Using stolen alien knowledge you could alter %0 to be more like your lost homeworld.
tech_cement_processing_effect: AI Cores run a special subroutine to optimize the manufacturing of cement.
tech_adamantite_processing_effect: AI Cores increase the efficiency of processing facilities.
tech_graphene_processing_effect: AI Cores increase the efficiency of graphene plants.
tech_fusion_power_effect: Fusion reactors are more energetic than fission and can generate massive amounts of power.
tech_infernium_power_effect: A power plant fueled by the new Infernium fuel would produce a lot of energy.
tech_thermomechanics_effect: A new alloying process increases the alloy output of factories.
tech_worker_drone_effect: Mining drones can help expedite neutronium mining on %0.
tech_uranium_effect: Learn how to extract trace amounts of uranium from coal deposits.
tech_uranium_storage_effect: Upgrade your fuel depots with specially-designed areas for storing uranium.
tech_uranium_ash_effect: Learn how to extract trace amounts of uranium from coal ash.
tech_breeder_reactor_effect: Breeder reactors allow you to more fully consume nuclear fuel, which increases the total output of fission reactors.
tech_mine_conveyor_effect: Add mining conveyor belts to your mining operations. Greatly increases mining excavation rates.
tech_oil_well_effect: Unlock oil derricks and begin the age of big oil.
tech_oil_refinery_effect: Unlock oil refineries and begin the age of big oil.
tech_oil_depot_effect: Design a facility specially made to increase your oil reserves.
tech_oil_power_effect: Design a power facility that runs on oil.
tech_wind_power_effect: Design an organized collection of machines that utilize the wind for energy.
tech_titanium_drills_effect: New oil drills made from titanium will increase oil production by an estimated 20%.
tech_alloy_drills_effect: Enhanced drills made with new alloys increase oil production by another estimated 25%.
tech_fracking_effect: A new oil mining technique, controversial but effective. Improves oil derrick output by 40%.
tech_mythril_drills_effect: New mythril drills will improve the efficiency of your oil derricks.
tech_mass_driver_effect: Mass drivers use an electromagnetic rail to launch payloads into orbit. It can be used to reduce the fuel consumption required by traditional rocket launches.
tech_orichalcum_driver_effect: Mass drivers upgraded with Orichalcum not only require less power to operate, but are of high interest to your scientists studying exotic materials.
tech_polymer_effect: Create a new high-tech polymer material that can be used for a wide variety of applications.
tech_polymer_avail: Polymer is now available for manufacture.
tech_fluidized_bed_reactor_effect: Fluidized bed reactors revolutionize the manufacturing of polymers, boosting output by an astonishing 42%.
tech_synthetic_fur_effect: Add the capacity for Factories to produce synthetic fur.
tech_faux_leather_effect: Add the capacity for Factories to produce Faux Leather.
tech_stanene_effect: Stanene is a supermaterial that is highly conductive. Perfect the manufacturing process so it can be mass-produced.
tech_stanene_avail: Stanene is now available for manufacture.
tech_nano_tubes_effect: Advanced computer models could help design a supermaterial known as carbon nano tubes.
tech_nano_tubes_msg: Nano Tubes are now available for manufacture
tech_nanoweave_effect: According to the alien database, an uber strong mesh-like material can be created by combining Vitreloy with Nanotubes.
tech_nanoweave_avail: Nanoweave is now available for crafting.
tech_scarletite_effect: The Codex Infernium outlines a process for making an advanced supermaterial that is both extraordinarily strong and can withstand extreme heat.
tech_scarletite_avail: Scarletite is now available for manufacture; however, it requires constructing a special forge at the ruins.
tech_pillars_msg: One of the pillars has a symbol that looks like a %0. It contains an open socket on the base. According to the Codex Infernium, something should happen if you permanently fuse a Harmony Crystal into the pillar using Scarletite.
tech_reclaimer_effect: Create a class of worker whose purpose is to strip the flesh from dead things and collect the bones.
tech_shovel_effect: A basic shovel will help reclaimers dig up "resources".
tech_iron_shovel_effect: Shovels made out of iron are more effective and will improve reclaimer productivity.
tech_steel_shovel_effect: Steel shovels are far superior to iron shovels and can be used by reclaimers to great efficiency.
tech_titanium_shovel_effect: New titanium shovels are all the rage in reclaimer technology.
tech_alloy_shovel_effect: Durable and lightweight alloy shovels are the best thing to happen in reclaimer technology since the invention of the nose plug.
tech_mythril_shovel_effect: Just when you thought shovels couldn't get any better. Increases reclaimer efficiency.
tech_adamantite_shovel_effect: The ultimate shovel. Improves reclaimer efficiency.
tech_stone_axe_effect: Creates a primitive axe made from stone lashed to a stick. Enables lumber harvesting.
tech_amber_axe_effect: Creates a primitive axe made from flint bonded to a stick with Amber. Enables lumber harvesting.
tech_basic_livingtools: Manipulate an appendage to form a basic chopping tool.
tech_copper_axes_desc: Create an axe made from bronze
tech_copper_axes_effect: Upgrade your axe technology to metal axes made from bronze. Improves lumber harvesting.
tech_iron_saw_effect: Sawmills increase the lumber yield of your lumberjacks.
tech_iron_axes_desc: Create a sturdy axe made from iron
tech_iron_axes_effect: Upgrade your axe technology to metal axes made from iron. Improves lumber harvesting.
tech_steel_axes_desc: Create a superior axe made from steel
tech_steel_axes_effect: Upgrade your axe technology to durable axes made from steel. Improves lumber harvesting.
tech_titanium_axes_desc: Create the ultimate axe made from titanium
tech_titanium_axes_effect: Upgrade your axe technology to durable axes made from titanium. Improves lumber harvesting.
tech_chainsaws_desc: Create a chainsaw with an adamantite chain
tech_chainsaws_effect: Replace hand axes with chainsaws. Improves lumber harvesting.
tech_copper_sledgehammer_desc: Create a sledgehammer with a bronze head
tech_copper_sledgehammer_effect: Create sledgehammers made from bronze. Improves rock quarrying.
tech_iron_sledgehammer_desc: Create a sledgehammer with an iron head
tech_iron_sledgehammer_effect: Upgrade to more durable sledgehammers made from iron. Improves rock quarrying.
tech_steel_sledgehammer_desc: Create a sledgehammer with a steel head
tech_steel_sledgehammer_effect: Upgrade to stronger sledgehammers made from steel. Improves rock quarrying.
tech_titanium_sledgehammer_desc: Create a sledgehammer with a titanium head
tech_titanium_sledgehammer_effect: Upgrade to stronger sledgehammers made from titanium. Improves rock quarrying.
tech_copper_pickaxe_desc: Create a pickaxe made from bronze
tech_copper_pickaxe_effect: Create metal pickaxes made with bronze heads. Improves mining activities.
tech_iron_pickaxe_desc: Create a pickaxe made from iron
tech_iron_pickaxe_effect: Upgrades pickaxe technology to metal pickaxes made from iron. Improves mining activities.
tech_steel_pickaxe_desc: Create a pickaxe made from steel
tech_steel_pickaxe_effect: Upgrades pickaxe technology to steel pickaxes. Improves mining activities.
tech_jackhammer_effect: Replace old mining pick technology with jackhammers. Improves mining activities.
tech_jackhammer_mk2_effect: Upgrade your jackhammers with newer models. Improves mining activities.
tech_improved_jackhammer_effect: Upgrade your jackhammers with %0 heads. Improves mining activities.
tech_copper_hoe_desc: Create farming tools made from bronze
tech_copper_hoe_effect: Create tools made from bronze that aid farming. Improves farm efficiency.
tech_iron_hoe_desc: Create farming tools made from iron
tech_iron_hoe_effect: Create tools made from iron that aid farming. Improves farm efficiency.
tech_steel_hoe_desc: Create better farming tools made from steel
tech_steel_hoe_effect: Create tools made from steel that aid farming. Improves farm efficiency.
tech_titanium_hoe_desc: Create better farming tools made from titanium
tech_titanium_hoe_effect: Create tools made from titanium that aid farming. Improves farm efficiency.
tech_adamantite_hoe_effect: Create farming tools made from adamantite. Improves farm efficiency.
tech_cyber_limbs_effect: Cybernetically-enhanced laborers will improve their work output.
tech_slave_pens_effect: Design a place to keep your unpaid labor.
tech_slave_market_effect: Allows buying of forced labor from unscrupulous traders.
tech_ceremonial_dagger_effect: A special ceremonial dagger to use in your sacrifices will increase the length of buffs gained per sacrifice.
tech_last_rites_effect: Infusing religion into your sacrifices increases their potency.
tech_ancient_infusion_effect: Dedicating the flesh of your kin to the Ancient Ones maximizes the strength received by consuming their flesh.
tech_garrison_effect: Establish a military to keep your citizens safe from external threats, or to conquer your enemies.
tech_mercs_effect: Unlocks the ability to hire mercenaries. You can pay a person to die for you, after all.
tech_signing_bonus_effect: Regenerate the mercenary pool faster by offering signing bonuses.
tech_hospital_desc: Design a medical facility for your wounded
tech_hospital_effect: Establish a triage center which can be used to accelerate the healing of wounded soldiers.
tech_bac_tanks_effect: Advanced healing vats can be used to quickly stabilize wounded soldiers, increasing the effectiveness of hospitals.
tech_repair_subroutines_effect: Advanced repair subroutines can be used to quickly repair damaged soldiers, increasing the effectiveness of the War Assembly repair function.
tech_boot_camp_effect: Accelerate the training of new soldiers with a specialized training facility.
tech_vr_training_effect: Increase the effectiveness of boot camps with realistic combat simulations.
tech_bows_effect: Create the bow and outfit your army with ranged weapons. It's sure to give you dominance over the primitives.
tech_harpoon_effect: Create the harpoon and outfit your army with ranged weapons. It's sure to give you dominance over the primitives.
tech_flintlock_rifle_effect: Outfit your army with firearms, which are much deadlier than primitive bows and arrows.
tech_magic_arrow_effect: Replace standard arrows with magical arrows.
tech_machine_gun_effect: Decimate your foes with rapid-fire weaponry.
tech_fire_mage_effect: Train special war mages to fling fireballs at your foes.
tech_bunk_beds_effect: Upgrade your garrisons to house additional soldiers.
tech_rail_guns_effect: New, more powerful weaponry for your army.
tech_lightning_caster_effect: Devastate the fields of battle by casting high-energy bolts of destruction at your enemies.
tech_mana_rifles_effect: Fire beams of mana to burn targets.
tech_plasma_rifles_effect: Outfit your soldiers with advanced weapons which can burn through any armor.
tech_focused_rifles_effect: Fire concentrated beams of mana to incinerate targets.
tech_disruptor_rifles_effect: Studying the high-intensity gamma rays from the neutron star has unlocked the secret to disruptor weapons, which destroy the bonds between molecules.
tech_magic_missile_effect: Train your mages to cast rapid-fire swarms of homing projectiles summoned from mana.
tech_gauss_rifles_effect: Gauss Rifles are a type of coil gun that fires slugs at unbelievable velocity. Combined with a new type of ammo inspired by the alien database, this weapon is capable of destruction on a scale never thought possible in a handheld weapon.
tech_magicword_kill_effect: Train your battlemages with a powerful curse spell that instantly kills a target.
tech_cyborg_soldiers_effect: Cybernetically-enhanced soldiers will perform much more efficiently than unmodified ones.
tech_ethereal_weapons_effect: Enhance your weapons with Asphodel Powder which makes them effective against spiritual beings and more deadly in general.
tech_laser_turret_effect1: Upgrade your fortress turrets with laser weaponry.
tech_laser_turret_effect2: Increases power consumption of turrets by 1.
tech_plasma_turret_effect: Upgrade your fortress turrets with plasma weaponry.
tech_hammocks_effect: Replace traditional bunks with Nanoweave Hammocks. Increases soldier capacity of Marine Barracks and Starbases.
tech_cruiser_effect: Design a spaceship that is made for combat to patrol your space and provide security.
tech_armor_effect: Basic armor made from leather. It will reduce the number of casualties you take during military actions.
tech_plate_armor_effect: Armor reinforced with iron plates. Heavy, but offers better protection for your soldiers.
tech_kevlar_effect: New armor made out of Kevlar provides modern protection for your soldiers.
tech_nanoweave_vest_effect: Nanoweave vests offer the best protection available for your soldiers.
tech_black_powder_effect: Usher in a new era of things that go boom. Surely nothing bad can happen thanks to this discovery...
tech_magic_powder_effect: Usher in a new era of things that go boom using this new enchanted powder that explodes when exposed to fire.
tech_dynamite_effect: Dynamite can be used to increase the efficiency of mining. No one would ever misuse this invention for nefarious purposes!
tech_anfo_effect: ANFO is a powerful explosive that can greatly aid mining activities.
tech_super_tnt_effect: TNT infused with %0 is shockingly good at blasting rocks.
tech_mad_effect: Create a network of nuclear-armed ICBMs to counter a similar threat by your enemies. Unlocks on the Military tab.
tech_mad_effect_easter: Create a network of ICBMs armed with Holy Hand Grenades to counter a similar threat by your enemies. Unlocks on the Military tab.
tech_mad_info: Nuclear launch missiles have been unlocked in the Civics -> Military tab.
tech_mad_info_easter: Holy Rocket Propelled Grenades have been unlocked in the Civics -> Military tab.
tech_cement_desc: Learn how to turn stone into cement
tech_cement_effect: Learn how to make cement from stone.
tech_rebar_effect: Adding rebar to concrete will make it much stronger and reduce building cement costs.
tech_steel_rebar_effect: Use stronger steel as rebar, further reducing building cement costs.
tech_portland_cement_effect: Portland cement is easier to make, boosting productivity of cement workers by 20%.
tech_screw_conveyor_effect: Screw conveyors can greatly increase the output of cement factories. However, they require power to operate.
tech_adamantite_screws_effect: Upgrade your cement plants with Adamantite threaded screw conveyors. Improves conveyor bonus by %0%.
tech_otherworldly_binder_effect: It seems using %0 as a binder can improve the quality and quantity of %1 produced.
tech_hunter_process_effect: Steel smelting will result in small amounts of titanium production.
tech_kroll_process_effect: Iron smelting will result in small amounts of titanium production.
tech_cambridge_process_effect: Modern techniques result in more efficient production of titanium from smelters.
tech_pynn_partical_effect: Subatomic particles discovered by Dr. Hank Pynn using the supercollider. They have applications in dimensional physics.
tech_matter_compression_effect: Use Pynn particles to shrink containers down to half size, therefore doubling the amount you can store.
tech_higgs_boson_effect: Discover the Higgs Boson. No one knows what practical application this has, but excitement about it will raise the contribution to science from supercolliders.
tech_dimensional_compression_effect: Supercolliders' space compression effect now applies to garages.
tech_theology_effect: Explore the mysteries of creation and faith.
tech_ancient_theology_effect: Evidence has been uncovered of an ancient civilization of %0 that might predate the %1 civilization.
tech_study_desc: Study the ancients and attempt to unlock their secrets
tech_study_effect: Study as many artifacts from the %0 race as you can to unlock their mysteries.
tech_study_warning: This is mutually exclusive with Deify; choose wisely.
tech_encoding_effect: Unlock the secrets held within the ancient genetic code. Boosts exo lab effectiveness.
tech_deify_desc: Embrace the ancients as old gods
tech_deify_effect: Declare the %0 race to be ancient gods and incorporate them into your culture.
tech_deify_warning: This is mutually exclusive with Study Ancients; choose wisely.
tech_infusion_effect: Infuse your DNA with ancient genetic material. Boosts Ziggurat effectiveness.
tech_fanaticism_effect: Revere your creators as literal gods and attempt to mimic them.
tech_fanaticism_warning: This is mutually exclusive with Anthropology; choose wisely.
tech_indoctrination_effect: Professors will help spread your ideology. Each professor gives a minor boost to temple effectiveness.
tech_missionary_effect: Missionaries will go forth to spread the word. Incidentally they will help establish new trade routes.
tech_zealotry_effect: Your fanatical followers will fight to the death making you feared in combat. Temples add a minor bonus to soldier effectiveness.
tech_anthropology_effect: Study your ancient creators and attempt to learn from them.
tech_anthropology_warning: This is mutually exclusive with Fanaticism; choose wisely.
tech_mythology_effect: Mythological stories of the creators boost your libraries by 5% per temple.
tech_archaeology_effect: Professors study the past history of the creators, boosting their effectiveness by 5% per temple.
tech_merchandising_effect: The popularity of the creators among your culture has led to great merchandising opportunities. Tax income is boosted by 2.5% per temple.
tech_merchandising_effect_tp: The popularity of the creators among your culture has led to great merchandising opportunities. Temples open shops selling merchandise to citizens to capitalize on this trend.
tech_astrophysics_effect: Navigating space requires research into a new branch of science called astrophysics.
tech_rover_effect: Design an unmanned vehicle which can be used to explore other planets and determine their potential.
tech_probes_effect: Design an unmanned spacecraft which can be used to survey far-away planetoids.
tech_starcharts_effect: Map the planets' orbits to determine the best routes for visiting further-away destinations.
tech_colonization_effect: They say you technically haven't colonized a place until you grow crops there. "Colonize" %0 by designing a biodome.
tech_colonization_artifical_effect: Develop signal towers to boost your reach across %0.
tech_red_tower_effect: Space traffic control towers can help regulate the traffic coming in and out of %0.
tech_space_manufacturing_effect: Research the logistics of manufacturing on %0.
tech_exotic_lab_effect: Design a special high-tech laboratory to study exotic materials.
tech_hydroponics_effect: Upgrading your biodomes with Bolognium Hydroponics Bays will increase the population they can support.
tech_dyson_sphere_effect: Science fiction has popularized the idea of a Dyson Sphere. Try to figure out how to make one.
tech_dyson_swarm_effect: A Dyson Sphere turns out to be completely impractical, if not impossible. Instead, design a network of solar satellites known as a Dyson Swarm.
tech_swarm_plant_effect: Manufacturing and deploying swarm satellites is expensive because of the distance from %0. By establishing automated facilities on %1, which is much closer to the sun, you can lower the costs.
tech_space_sourced_effect: Space-sourced iron can reduce the volume needed to construct swarm plants.
tech_swarm_plant_ai_effect: Advanced AI controlling the production at swarm facilities could boost their productivity.
tech_swarm_control_ai_effect: With AI controlling your solar swarm, you can operate additional satellites per control station.
tech_quantum_swarm_effect: By upgrading your swarm plant AI with quantum processors, the efficiency of the plants is limited only by your capacity for knowledge.
tech_perovskite_cell_effect: Perovskite Solar Cells are more efficient and will increase the output of your swarm satellites.
tech_swarm_convection_effect: Adding stanene to your solar swarm arrays will increase their efficiency.
tech_orichalcum_panels_effect: Orichalcum-plated solar panels can improve your solar swarm efficiency per satellite.
tech_dyson_net_effect: Previous attempts to design a Dyson Sphere were unsuccessful. However, it may now be possible to construct a Dyson Net surrounding the Proxima star. Instead of surrounding the star with a hard shell, a Dyson Net would surround the much smaller Proxima star with a highly conductive net-like material.
tech_dyson_sphere2_effect: With modern technology it is now possible to upgrade your Dyson Net into a full Dyson Sphere.
tech_orichalcum_sphere_effect: Upgrading your Dyson Sphere with Orichalcum plating can increase the power generated by it.
tech_elysanite_sphere_effect: Reline the Dyson Sphere with Elysanite paneling which greatly increases its output.
tech_quantum_manufacturing_effect: AI powered by quantum processors can improve the output of your factories. Efficiency scales with your maximum capacity for knowledge.
tech_gps_effect: Design a network of navigation satellites.
tech_nav_beacon_effect: Navigation assistance beacons will help guide space traffic.
tech_subspace_signal_effect: Upgrade your navigation beacons to be detectable from %0.
tech_atmospheric_mining_effect: Learn the physics of operating a mining platform in the orbit of a gas giant.
tech_ram_scoops_effect: Upgrade Gas Harvesters with ram scoops for collecting Deuterium.
tech_elerium_prospecting_effect: Adapt your elerium mining ships for use in the Helix Nebula.
tech_zero_g_mining_effect: Asteroid mining in Zero G presents new challenges that must be studied before this resource can be developed.
tech_elerium_mining_effect: Elerium is a rare new highly energetic element discovered in the asteroid belt. Mining this element safely will require specialized harvesting equipment and containment vessels.
tech_laser_mining_effect: Laser mining drills can cut through asteroids quicker than traditional methods.
tech_plasma_mining_effect: Plasma beams can be used to vaporize asteroids and expedite the mining process.
tech_elerium_tech_effect: Study the elerium to unlock its mysteries.
tech_elerium_reactor_effect: Elerium is highly energetic. The prospect of making a power source out of it is too good to ignore.
tech_neutronium_housing_effect: Neutronium supports make Living Quarters cheaper to produce on %0.
tech_unification_effect: Come up with a plan to unify the world under your control.
tech_unification_effect2: You must control all three rival cities to complete unification.
tech_wc_conquest_effect: Attempt to conquer the world with your superior military might.
tech_unification_warning: Unification changes the game. There will be no more conflict, but you'll gain +25% global production and approximately double storage capacity.
tech_unification_banana: Unification ends the Banana Republic scenario; you will not be able to earn credit for additional Banana Smoothie objectives or earn Banana Split!
tech_unite_desc: Unite your region of city-states into a country.
tech_unite_effect: Become one unified country, gaining bonuses to storage and production.
tech_wc_morale_effect: Use your superior culture to try and take over %0.
tech_wc_money_effect: Attempt to seize control of %0 by funding subversive activities.
tech_wc_reject_effect: Give up on your plans for world domination. Instead, focus on improving your own society.
tech_wc_reject_warning: The game stays the same; gain a 20% morale bonus.
tech_genesis_effect: Our species appears to be doomed. Research the possibility of leaving behind a lasting legacy by bioseeding a planet in another star system with life of our design.
tech_star_dock_effect: Design a space-based shipyard which can be used to construct advanced ships.
tech_interstellar_effect: Scouting outside the solar system will require much more advanced probe designs than what is currently employed.
tech_genesis_ship_effect: Design the genesis ship that will be used to bioseed a faraway planet.
tech_generational_effect: Design a generational ship which will be used to transport your species to a new home in a faraway star system.
tech_geck_effect: Design a terraforming device that could help improve a potential new homeworld.
tech_genetic_decay_effect: Research the genetic decay problem and try to find a solution.
tech_stabilize_decay_effect: Stabilizes your genetic decay, greatly amplifying the effect of Fortifying your genes.
tech_tachyon_effect: Tachyon particles are a fascinating discovery, particles that move faster than light. This could revolutionize space travel.
tech_warp_drive_effect: The Alcubierre Drive is an engine that folds space in front of it to give the effect of faster-than-light travel.
tech_habitat_effect: Design a habitat specifically for living on Alpha Centauri IV.
tech_graphene_effect: Graphene is a supermaterial made primarily out of carbon. This advanced material has a lot of potential.
tech_aerogel_effect: Aerogel is a supermaterial that is as strong as steel but also weighs practically nothing.
tech_gravitational_waves_effect: Studying the gravitational waves generated by the black hole could lead to exciting new breakthroughs.
tech_gravity_convection_effect: After studying the gravimetric waves generated by the black hole, it should be possible to increase the efficiency of the Stellar Engine.
tech_wormholes_effect: Opening a tunnel through space could be the fastest way to travel to a faraway destination.
tech_art_wormholes_effect: Creating an artificial tunnel through space could be the fastest way to travel to a faraway destination.
tech_stellar_engine_effect: Constructing a Stellar Engine around a black hole could be the ultimate power source.
tech_mass_ejector_effect: The Stellar Engine turned out to be underwhelming. Your top minds think the problem is that the black hole isn't massive enough. Turn the black hole into your own personal interstellar garbage disposal by designing a method to eject extra mass into the black hole in an attempt to beef it up.
tech_asteroid_redirect_effect: Design giant engines that can be strapped to asteroids to change their trajectory into the black hole.
tech_exotic_infusion_effect: The exotic material in the black hole is having a positive effect on the stellar engine; beef it up by ejecting into it the most exotic material you possess... %0.
tech_exotic_infusion_effect2: Note: your scientists think this is a bad idea, yadda yadda; could catastrophically explode; whatever.
tech_exotic_infusion_flair: You have a good feeling about this
tech_infusion_check_effect: Are you sure? This might have bigger consequences than you think. Last chance to back out; maybe you should backup your game file.
tech_infusion_confirm_effect: Seriously, last chance to abort. This is probably an achievement, but is it worth it?
tech_infusion_confirm_flair: Goodbye, cruel world! Goodbye, cruel lamp! Goodbye, cruel velvet drapes, lined with what would appear to be some sort of cruel muslin and the cute little pom-pom curtain pull cords.
tech_stabilize_blackhole_effect: The exotic material inside the black hole seems to be having a more significant impact on your Stellar Engine than normal matter. However, it is also causing the black hole to emit strange readings that are of grave concern. Stabilize the black hole by ejecting a large amount of the densest material known to you into it.
tech_veil_effect: Investigate the veil, a mysterious barrier separating the metastable universe from the void. Infinite magic is believed to lie beyond it.
tech_mana_syphon_effect: A magical syphon used to extract mana from the void. This is an ambitious project that could destroy the universe by unleashing a bubble of true vacuum.
tech_portal_effect: Controlling a gateway to another dimension would allow exploration and exploitation of other realities.
tech_fort_effect: Our exploration of the other dimension has been met with extreme hostility from bizarre creatures some are calling demons. Fortifying our position on the other side is required.
tech_war_drones_effect: Design drones to patrol the demonic wastelands and help safeguard your operations.
tech_demon_attractor_effect: A beacon emitting a signal could be used to attract demons to an area.
tech_combat_droids_effect: Heavily armed patrol droids could help keep the demonic hordes at bay.
tech_repair_droids_effect: Repair droids can be used to speed up fortification and vehicle repairs.
tech_advanced_predators_effect: New upgraded Predator Drones will be more effective than the old model.
tech_enhanced_droids_effect: Upgrades for your war droids will double their effectiveness.
tech_sensor_drone_effect: Specialized drones could be used to help surveyors locate infernite deposits.
tech_map_terrain_effect: Map the area surrounding the Hell fortress to aid your surveyors in navigating the region.
tech_calibrated_sensors_effect: Calibrate your sensor drones to better detect potential infernite deposits.
tech_shield_generator_effect: New advances in shield technology can produce a generator small enough to fit on a car. Reduces the odds of surveyors being killed on the job.
tech_enhanced_sensors_effect: Enhance Sensor Drones with new technology, greatly increasing their effectiveness.
tech_xeno_linguistics_effect: The encounter with the alien vessel has revealed a communications problem; we couldn't understand them and a hostile encounter ensued. A plan to understand alien languages must be developed.
tech_xeno_culture_effect: In order to establish relations with the %0 we need to understand their culture. Undertake a study to help us better understand the %1.
tech_cultural_exchange_effect: Improving relations with the %0 race opens the possibility of establishing a permanent presence in their colony to learn from each other.
tech_shore_leave_effect: Ships stationed in the Gorddon System will boost Symposium effectiveness.
tech_xeno_gift_effect: A gift to our new alien friends might help improve relations with them.
tech_xeno_gift_msg: Relations have improved with the %0 race to the point where we have been invited to their home star system.
tech_industrial_partnership_effect: Form a partnership with our %0 allies. We will supply the raw materials and they will supply the technical experience to manufacture Vitreloy.
tech_embassy_housing_effect: Add luxury housing to the %0 Embassy for the staff and their families.
tech_advanced_telemetry_effect: Upgraded telemetry beacons will improve their functionality by 50%.
tech_defense_platform_effect: Design a weaponized satellite to protect the stargate.
tech_scout_ship_effect: Design a lightly armed ship for use in scouting the Andromeda galaxy.
tech_corvette_ship_effect: A more militant ship is required to protect our interests. Design a corvette class military ship to patrol Andromeda.
tech_frigate_ship_effect: Design a frigate-class warship to protect your interests in the Andromeda galaxy.
tech_frigate_ship_flair: Warships? Just go Balorg and spam combat!
tech_cruiser_ship_effect: The time has come to take the fight back to the %0; in order to launch a successful attack on the resource-rich %0 system we will need a more powerful military vessel.
tech_dreadnought_effect: A new super-heavy warship designed by combining alien technology with our own will dominate Andromeda.
tech_ship_dock_effect: Ship docks will expand the maximum size of the fleet you can support in Andromeda.
tech_ore_processor_effect: Adding ore processing facilities to your foothold stations can help purify ore before being transported out of the system, increasing the amount of usable material exported.
tech_scavenger_effect: The conflict with the %0 creates the opportunity to scavenge useful tech from them. Small craft deployed to salvage anything useful from alien sites could be lucrative.
tech_coordinates_effect: Decrypt coordinates to a system the aliens seem to have high interest in.
tech_chthonian_survey_effect: Survey the Chthonian planet to find out what makes it so special.
tech_chthonian_survey_result: The Chthonian planet contains vast quantities of a previously unknown material called Orichalcum.
tech_gateway_depot_effect: Design a storage area in Andromeda to support your expansion.
tech_soul_forge_effect: Study the hell dimension artifact to reveal its secrets.
tech_soul_attractor_effect: Design a special tower to attract free-roaming souls to your soul forge.
tech_soul_absorption_effect: Increase the amount of power sucked out of each soul, therefore decreasing the total number of souls needed to forge a gem.
tech_soul_link_effect: Creates a link between Soul Attractors and the Soul Forge, reducing the souls needed to forge a gem.
tech_soul_bait_effect: Enhancing your Soul Attractors with %0 calms nearby raging spirits and doubles the effectiveness of %1 on them.
tech_gun_emplacement_effect: Draw up plans to fortify the Soul Forge with gun emplacements.
tech_advanced_emplacement_effect: Upgrade your Gun Emplacements with new tech, increasing their effectiveness.
tech_dial_it_to_11_effect: A supercollider on %0 causing quakes on %1? Sounds preposterous! Let's dial up the World Collider to 11 and see what happens.
tech_dial_it_to_11_effect2: This will cause a calamity. Don't do it unless you really mean it.
tech_limit_collider_effect: You don't understand all the science, but to be safe limit future operations of the World Collider.
tech_ley_lines_effect: Mapping the Ley Lines will let you know the best places to construct pylons to harvest mana from the land.
tech_rituals_effect: Rituals are a type of persistent spell that has a continuous effect as long as it's channelled.
tech_crafting_ritual_effect: Discover a new ritual that can boost crafting.
tech_mana_nexus_effect: Unlock the Mana Nexus, which can boost the output of Pylons.
tech_clerics_effect: Encourage priests to draw mana from the divine to help feed your mana addiction.
tech_conjuring_effect: Learn to conjure food from mana.
tech_res_conjuring_effect: Learn to conjure basic resources using mana.
tech_alchemy_effect: Learn to transmute Crystal into other materials using Mana.
tech_transmutation_effect: Learn to transmute Crystal into advanced materials with Mana.
tech_secret_society_effect: It is dangerous to openly practice magic, as you risk drawing the attention of the witch hunters. You and your allies must practice in secrecy.
tech_cultists_effect: Induct your priests as members of your secret society to help hide your ritual activity.
tech_conceal_ward_effect: Use illusion magic to create concealing wards to hide your magic activity.
tech_subtle_rituals_effect: Advance your rituals so you can cast them while drawing less attention.
tech_pylon_camouflage_effect: Hide your pylons better by disguising them as natural features.
tech_fake_tech_effect: Reduce suspicion from magic-based heavy industry by disguising it with cool-looking high-tech gizmos that don't actually do anything.
tech_concealment_effect: Use the Mana Nexus to reduce the Mana requirements for Concealment Wards.
tech_improved_concealment_effect: Use forbidden knowledge to make concealment wards more effective.
tech_outerplane_summon_effect: You can sense the presence of unfathomable beings far away in the outer planes. You can enhance your ascension ritual to call to them using the Demonic Essence you obtained.
tech_dark_bomb_effect: Blow up the Demon Lord with a Dark Energy bomb.
tech_dark_bomb_flair: It's not cheating, it's being resourceful.
tech_bribe_sphinx_effect: The Sphinx has let you pass, but maybe you can still learn something from it if you give it proper tribute.
tech_bribe_sphinx_msg: The Sphinx has given you a book.
tech_zero_g_lab_effect: A lab in space would allow for specialized experiments to be conducted.
tech_alien_biotech_effect: Upgrade your biolabs with technology gained from the derelict ship.
tech_alien_biotech_effect_alt: Upgrade your universities with technology gained from the derelict ship.
tech_operating_base_effect: Prepare plans for a permanent military installation at %0.
tech_munitions_depot_effect: A space-based storage area near your operating bases would be useful.
tech_fob_effect: A Forward Operating Base at %0 will be necessary to establish control of %0.
tech_sam_site_effect: Design a surface to air weapon platform to help defend %0 against attack.
tech_data_cracker_effect: A specialized facility to decode the %0 could be used to advance your knowledge.
tech_ai_optimizations_effect: Use the AI to optimize your Electrolysis Plants.
tech_synthetic_life_effect: You're not actually sure who proposed this research, or what you are funding exactly.
tech_protocol66_flair: Better not, it's probably a reset
tech_protocol66a_flair: This didn't end well for the space wizards...
tech_medkit_effect: Advanced medkits outfit your doctors with the latest medical technology to keep your soldiers healthy, increasing the effectiveness of hospitals.
tech_quantium_effect: Quantium is an artificial resource that can be synthesized in a lab. It has amazing properties that defy conventional physics.
tech_anitgrav_bunk_effect: Special bunks designed to float soldiers in bed, increasing the capacity of %0.
tech_quantum_signatures_effect: The ability to detect quantum signatures at great distances greatly enhances your sensor potential.
tech_interstellar_drive_effect: A new design for an interstellar drive, which requires a specially designed ship to house the experimental engine but could reach other nearby star systems in decades instead of centuries.
tech_alien_outpost_effect: Research the Alien Outpost to unlock its secrets.
tech_alien_outpost_msg: The Alien Outpost appears to be some kind of research lab. You find plans for a "Jump Gate" which, if constructed, could connect your colony with your home system.
tech_jumpgates_effect: Study the Jump Gate plans to learn how to construct them.
tech_system_survey_effect: Studying old system surveys found in the alien outpost database could benefit us by directing us to worthwhile sectors to explore.
tech_tau_fusion_power_effect: Helium-3 fueled fusion generator stations would be clean and efficient power sources for your Tau Ceti colony.
tech_weasels_msg: According to the records in the Alien Outpost the weasels on %0 are an accident-prone race called the Womlings. They apparently worship a god called "Jeff" which is nothing more than an abandoned proto AI computer which seems to dispense wisdom the Womlings use to guide their species' development.
tech_jeff_effect_msg: Jeff turns out to not be a true AI and seems to be following some protocol when dealing with the Womlings. It teaches you the Womling language. You can either establish direct contact with the Womlings or issue edicts through Jeff. They could be a useful resource to cultivate.
tech_womling_unlock_effect: According to the alien database there is a species of weasel-like creatures living on the next planet over %0. They are being governed by an AI called Jeff which is controlled from the Alien Outpost. Take a shuttle over and meet them.
tech_womling_fun_effect: Design a form of Womling Entertainment to keep them happily motivated.
tech_womling_lab_effect: The Womlings always give 110%, and now they can give it for science!
tech_womling_mining_effect: Upgrades the Womlings' ability to move dirt, boosting Womling mining efforts.
tech_womling_firstaid_effect: Improve effectiveness of first aid on Womlings, which helps them recover from injuries faster.
tech_womling_logistics_effect: Improved logistics will let your %0 support more Womling development.
tech_womling_repulser_effect: Repulser Pads allow for hard landings which in turn reduce %0 requirements for the %1.
tech_womling_farming_effect: Improve the effectiveness of Womling Farmers.
tech_womling_housing_effect: Design more efficent housing for Womlings, improving Village capacity.
tech_womling_support_effect: Hire Womling technicians to work on your space mining operations.
tech_womling_recycling_effect: Womling Recycling technology reduces the amount of crafted materials you need to build various structures in Tau Ceti by recycling crafted material waste.
tech_asteroid_analysis_effect: Analyze the data sent back from the asteroid survey probes.
tech_asteroid_analysis_msg: The native space creatures seem to be able to be categorized into two distinct groups: Whales and Sharks. The Whales are large but generally not aggressive, while the Sharks are smaller but try to eat anything they can find, including spaceships. You're not entirely clear on how they survive and move in space, but they inhabit the asteroid fields everywhere.
tech_shark_repellent_effect: We need to come up with defenses to keep the space sharks away if we are to exploit the resources of the asteroid belt.
tech_shark_repellent_msg: In the end, the best solution your scientists could come up with was to simply shoot the sharks. It turns out sharks really do not like being shot.
tech_belt_mining_effect: Work out the logistics of mining the Tau Ceti asteroid belt.
tech_adv_belt_mining_effect: Enable your mining ships to extract more rare elements from the Tau Ceti asteroid belt.
tech_space_whaling_effect: The space whales are themselves a natural resource. Organized hunts could provide valuable returns.
tech_infectious_disease_lab_effect: A specially-designed facility to handle researching dangerous diseases.
tech_infectious_disease_lab_effect_s: A specially-designed facility to handle researching dangerous code fragments.
tech_isolation_protocol_effect: Cut off the %0 colony to save it from the plague by disabling the Jump Gate. This abandons everything except Tau Ceti.
tech_isolation_protocol_warning: This is mutually exclusive with Focus Cure. The unprepared might not survive.
tech_focus_cure_effect: Ban non-essential travel to and from the %0 system and focus your efforts on a cure.
tech_focus_cure_warning: This is mutually exclusive with Isolation Protocol.
tech_decode_virus_msg1: You have begun decoding the virus genetic structure at your %0. Build more labs to speed up the process.
tech_decode_virus_msg1s: You have begun decoding the virus code at your %0. Build more labs to speed up the process.
tech_decode_virus_msg2: You have developed a vaccine to the virus that makes use of new experimental genetic alterations to make your population immune. Early trials show promise.
tech_decode_virus_msg2s: You have developed an update to block the virus that makes use of new experimental genetic algorithms to make your population immune. Early trials show promise.
tech_vaccine_campaign_effect: Ramp up a vaccination campaign to defeat the virus. More %0 accelerate the process.
tech_vaccine_campaign_msg1: Fear of the virus has dropped and people are starting to refuse to take the vaccine, with some claiming there are side effects worse than the virus. It's becoming harder to convince people to take it due to a lack of long-term studies of the vaccine.
tech_vaccine_campaign_msg2: You have fully vaccinated your people. In unrelated news, medical journals are starting to report a drop in the birth rate.
tech_vaccine_campaign_msg2s: You have fully patched your people. In unrelated news, the assembly plant is reporting that newly-constructed citizens are not sentient anymore. These defective models are useless.
tech_vax_strat1_effect: Run a propaganda campaign to convince people to take the vaccine.
tech_vax_strat1_msg: The propaganda seems to be working.
tech_vax_strat2_effect: Round people up and force them to take the vaccine.
tech_vax_strat2_msg: Forced vaccination is massively unpopular; morale has suffered greatly.
tech_vax_strat3_effect: Use the actual science to convince people to take the vaccine.
tech_vax_strat3_msg: Due to a lack of actual science it's not very effective, but this popular move is working slowly.
tech_vax_strat4_effect: Covertly vaccinate people without their knowledge.
tech_vax_strat4_msg: Conspiracy nuts frequently talk about your secret vaccination campaign, but most think it's just rumors.
tech_vax_warning: You can only pick one vaccination strategy.
tech_cloning_effect: Your cure may have accidentally caused mass sterility. Invest in cloning to keep your population up.
tech_cloning_effect_s: Your cure may have accidentally caused newly constructed citizens to malfunction. Invest in copying existing citizens to keep your population up.
tech_clone_degradation_effect: Now that Cloning is your primary method of reproduction, you need to study the effects of making copies of copies.
tech_clone_degradation_msg: It seems that making copies of copies will eventually become unviable; you need to find an alternative solution.
tech_digital_paradise_effect: You can't figure out how to solve the cloning problem; it could take thousands of years to solve. Design a massive simulation to survive digitally.
tech_ringworld_effect: A massive automated ringworld will house the simulation matrix and absorb power directly from its host star to power it. It will have the power to one day revive your people when the cloning issue is solved.
tech_long_range_probes_effect: Design new space probes for long-term operations in the outer solar system.
tech_strange_signal_effect: Your new quantum scanning technology has detected a strange signal. Trace it back to its origin.
tech_data_analysis_effect: The Encrypted Data is useless unless we can solve how to decrypt it.
tech_data_analysis_result: You've cracked the code and can now begin analysing the Encrypted Data for its secrets.
tech_mass_relay_effect: The Mass Relay is a structure that temporarily lowers the mass of a starship, allowing it to accelerate to higher speeds. This will make ships departing your shipyard travel thrice as fast, but they'll have no assistance on subsequent journeys unless returned to the shipyard.
tech_nav_data_effect: Decode navigation data from the derelict ship to see where it's been.
tech_nav_data_result: Navigation logs show the ship passed through the Tau Ceti system thousands of years ago, as well as scanning several interesting sites in the Kuiper Belt and the dwarf planet %0.
tech_sensor_logs_effect: Analyze the Tau Ceti Sensor Data.
tech_sensor_logs_result: Sensor logs indicate the Tau Ceti system contains two good candidate planets for an extrasolar colony. You don't, however, currently possess technology to reach there in any reasonable time frame.
tech_dronewar_effect: The cost to send soldiers to invade %0 is too high. Instead, prepare a robot army commanded by the Titan AI to secure the dwarf planet.
tech_drone_tank_effect: Design tanks to be controlled by your AI.
tech_electrolysis_effect: Large-scale electrolysis can be used on %0 if a steady supply of %1 can be found. Splitting the %1 molecules will provide both a source of oxygen and power from hydrogen.
tech_storehouse_effect: Design a structure suited for storage in the unique environment of %0.
tech_titan_bank_effect: Establishing a bank on %0 would help grow the colony.
tech_hydrogen_plant_effect: Design a companion facility to use waste hydrogen from your electrolysis facilities to generate power.
tech_water_mining_effect: Mass mining %2 from the moon %0 is tricky, but the most practical source of a vital resource to supply the outer %1 system.
tech_mercury_smelting_effect: The planet %0 is naturally hot due to proximity to the sun and would be a great place to set up large scale smelting operations.
tech_iridium_smelting_effect: Your standard smelters could be upgraded to smelt Iridium, increasing your gains from inner solar system sources.
tech_quantium_containers_effect: We're not sure why, but adding %0 to your containers seems to make them bigger on the inside.
tech_reinforced_shelving_effect: Using Reinforced Shelving in your storehouses can let you stack more heavy materials on them.
tech_garage_shelving_effect: Lining your garage shelves with Quantium somehow makes the materials stacked on them lighter, allowing you to pile up more heavy materials.
tech_warehouse_shelving_effect: An advanced system that uses robotic shelving racks which rearrange themselves to pack in more goods. Increases capacity of warehouses, garages, and storehouses.
tech_elerium_extraction_effect: Deposits of Elerium have been found in the Kuiper belt, but specialized extraction methods need to be developed to safely mine it.
tech_shipyard_effect: Design a massive Ship Yard complex on %0 to construct your fleet.
tech_ship_lasers_effect: Design large military-grade lasers usable on space craft.
tech_pulse_lasers_effect: Pulse lasers are like machine gun lasers: they fire rapid short burts of high energy.
tech_ship_plasma_effect: Design highly devastating military-grade plasma beams for your ships.
tech_ship_phaser_effect: Phasers are high-energy pulses of energy that can be extremely devastating.
tech_ship_disruptor_effect: Disruptors are energy weapons that disrupt the bonds between molecules. They are highly devastating.
tech_destroyer_ship_effect: Design a Destroyer-class ship for use in your fleet.
tech_cruiser_ship_tp: Design a Cruiser-class ship for use in your fleet.
tech_h_cruiser_ship_effect: Design a Heavy Cruiser-class ship for use in your fleet.
tech_dreadnought_ship_effect: Design a ship so large and powerful that it is completely impractical.
tech_pulse_engine_effect: A new engine concept called the Pulse Drive, which creates a rapid series of small explosions behind the ship to accelerate it.
tech_photon_engine_effect: An advanced engine design that uses a stream of charged particles to accelerate your ships.
tech_fusion_generator_effect: The new military-grade fusion generator can provide more power to a spaceship than ever before possible.
tech_repository_effect: A storage facility designed for the Tau Ceti environment.
tech_tau_cultivation_effect: Learn how to best grow crops in the New %0 soil.
tech_tau_manufacturing_effect: Design eco-friendly manufacturing facilities for New %0.
tech_elerium_generator_effect: The Elerium Generator produces an unrivaled amount of energy for your ships.
tech_outpost_boost_effect: Activate a mysterious device located in the Alien Outpost.
tech_cultural_center_effect: Design a space that is dedicated to for-profit leisure activities.
tech_cultural_center_flair: It's like a tax, but people are happy about it!
tech_outer_tau_survey_effect: Survey the outermost planet of the system.
tech_alien_research_effect: Study the alien space station data storage to determine what they were doing out here.
tech_alien_research_msg: Looks like they were studying a lot of things, from the primitive Womlings to theoretical physics. You'll need to decode their data further.
tech_womling_gene_therapy_effect: Using the genetic research found in the alien data, you can design genetic enhancements for the Womlings to boost their productivity.
tech_food_culture_effect: Start selling the alien %0 at your %1.
tech_advanced_refinery_effect: Increase the amount of ore one of your refineries can process.
tech_advanced_pit_mining_effect: Increase the output yield of your pit miners.
tech_useless_junk_effect: Try to market the alien %0 as some kind of fancy luxury item to the %1.
tech_matrioshka_brain_effect: The Matrioshka Brain is a planet-sized computer that will be constructed around %0.
tech_ignition_device_effect: In order to power the Matrioshka Brain, you'll have to turn %0 into an artificial sun.
tech_replicator_effect: Learn how to use an alien device found at the outpost that can turn energy into matter.
tech_replicator_effect_alt: Archaeologists found a strange alien device; your scientists believe it can convert energy into matter.
tech_antireplicator_effect: Learn how to use an alien device found at the outpost that can turn energy into antimatter.
tech_antireplicator_effect_alt: Archaeologists found a strange alien device; your scientists believe it can convert energy into antimatter.
tech_banquet_effect: Learn how to construct a building that can prepare special food that boosts various attributes.
tech_garden_of_eden_effect: The advanced facilities and immense power collected by the Ringworld allow you the possibility of constructing a cloning facility which you could use to repopulate your species.
tech_garden_of_eden_flair: Create your own Garden of Eden.
tech_asphodel_flowers_effect: Research the ghostly asphodel flowers to unlock their secrets.
tech_asphodel_flowers_msg: The roots of the Asphodel plant can be ground up into a powder that has many mystical properties. This powder however doesn't last very long and rapidly decays.
tech_ghost_traps_effect: You can design a spirit trap to capture the wandering souls and ship them to the soul forge.
tech_research_station_effect: A specialized Research Station for studying the afterlife realm could greatly progress science.
tech_spirit_box_effect: Record extra information from the dead using Spirit Boxes and study it at the Symposium. Magisterium knowledge boosted by Symposiums.
tech_spirit_researcher_effect: Introduce new scientific fields of study into the occult. %0 will generate Omniscience.
tech_soul_engine_effect: Design a Soul Engine which will suck in souls from the surrounding environment and use them to create power.
tech_railway_to_hell_effect: Use %0 to ward off evil and extend your railways into hell.
tech_purification_effect: Use %0 to amplify the purification effect of the %1 by %2% per %3.
tech_asphodel_mech_effect: Design a substation to operate your spire mechs as security in the Asphodel Meadows.
tech_asphodel_storage_effect: %0 is difficult to store, keeping a warehouse in the edenic realms is the best solution.
tech_asphodel_stabilizer_effect: Design a stabilizer unit for your storage facility to help prevent %0 from decaying.
tech_edenic_bunker_effect: Establish permanent military fortifications in the edenic meadows.
tech_bliss_den_effect: Apparently a new trend of ingesting %0 has emerged as it creates feelings of euphoria. Might as well capitalize on it.
tech_hallowed_housing_effect: Many of your %0 have expressed interest in establishing residence in the %1.
tech_outer_plane_study_effect: The outer planes may have many layers, seek out other planes.
tech_camouflage_effect: Issue uniforms specially made to help avoid celestial detection.
tech_celestial_tactics_effect: By analyzing the tactics observed in combat we can better evade celestial counter attacks.
tech_active_camouflage_effect: Use captured supplies to improve your ability to surprise the enemy.
tech_special_ops_training_effect: Conduct special training drills at the %0 to prepare specifically for combat in the heavens.
tech_spectral_training_effect: Open a training facility at the Asphodel %0 to train new recruits.
tech_elysanite_mining_effect: A new mineral ore called %0 is awaiting your exploitation.
tech_sacred_smelter_effect: Smelt ore like never before in Elysium!
tech_fire_support_base_effect: Make plans to reconstruct the fallen fortress to support your invasion.
tech_pillbox_effect: You should prepare defenses against counter attacks, it would be foolish not to.
tech_elerium_cannon_effect: Outfit the %0 with a massive Elerium Cannon.
tech_ambrosia_effect: Learn to make the food of the gods and serve it to your people.
tech_eternal_bank_effect: Showcase the glory of your empire by hoarding great amounts of wealth in the heavens.

achieve_apocalypse_desc: Wiped yourself out with nuclear weapons.
achieve_ascended_desc: Ascended to a higher plane of existence.
achieve_godslayer_flair: Erase the old, in with the new.
achieve_anarchist_desc: Initiated a nuclear holocaust with an anarchy government.
achieve_anarchist_flair: Some people just want to watch the world burn
achieve_squished_desc: Got crushed in a micro universe.
achieve_second_evolution_desc: Evolve the same species twice in a row and then worship your ancestors.
achieve_blackhole_desc: Didn't destroy your planet with an artificial black hole.
achieve_warmonger_desc: Have a warmonger penalty of 8% or more.
achieve_warmonger_flair: What is best in life? To see your enemies fall before you.
achieve_red_tactics_desc: Lose 250 soldiers in a single game.
achieve_pacifist_desc: Achieve unification without ever initiating an attack in your current game run.
achieve_neutralized_flair: I don't want neutral. I want dead.
achieve_godwin_desc: Unlock the internet with toxic trolls.
achieve_infested_desc: Infested a human with mind-controlling parasites.
achieve_mass_starvation_desc: Have 100 citizens starve to death in a single game.
achieve_colonist_flair: That's one small step for a %0...
achieve_world_domination_desc: Conquered the world through only military force.
achieve_world_domination_flair: All those games of RISK finally paid off
achieve_illuminati_desc: Seized control of the world through only influential dominance.
achieve_syndicate_desc: Used only your wealth to execute a takeover of the world.
achieve_cult_of_personality_desc: Inspired your people with your leadership abilities.
achieve_cult_of_personality_flair: What is steel compared to the hand that wields it?
achieve_double_density_desc: Bioseed from a dense planet in a heavy universe.
achieve_pandemonium_desc: Constructed a fortress to hold back the tides of Hell.
achieve_blood_war_desc: Joined an ancient never-ending war between demons.
achieve_cross_flair: Total protonic reversal, it would be bad
achieve_landfill_desc: Expanded a black hole to 12 solar masses using mass ejectors.

achieve_whitehole_desc: Caused a standard black hole to explode and trigger a new big bang.
achieve_whitehole_flair: You wiped out the universe, I hope you're happy with yourself.
achieve_heavy_desc: Caused a universe to collapse under its own weight.
achieve_heavy_flair: Is there something wrong with the gravity in your universe?

achieve_banana_flair: One export to rule them all.

achieve_pathfinder_flair: Just another fork in the road.

achieve_exodus_flair: It'll take much longer than 40 years.
achieve_obsolete_desc: Triggerd an AI Apocalypse and got replaced by machines.
achieve_obsolete_flair: This mission is too important for me to allow you to jeopardize it.
achieve_retired_desc: Retired to enjoy the easy life.
achieve_overlord_desc: Complete a 4th tier reset while ruling over the Womlings using all 3 strategies.
achieve_adam_eve_desc: Restarted your population growth after being reduced to one.
achieve_what_is_best_flair: Crush your enemies, see them driven before you
achieve_blacken_the_sun_flair: All your light are belong to us.

feat_egghunt_flair: I hope you found them before they started to smell
feat_launch_day_desc: Idled a civilization during Launch Day.
feat_solstice_desc: Burn 1 Million Thermite during the Solstice Festival.
feat_firework_desc: Activate the Firework Factory during the Firework Festival.
feat_trickortreat_desc: Found at least 12 Candies and Ghosts during the Trick or Treat event.
feat_gobble_gobble_desc: Idled a civilization during Thanksgiving week.
feat_xmas_flair: Help! I'm stuck in a chimney!
arpa_projects_lhc_desc: A supercollider will help expand your understanding of theoretical sciences.
arpa_projects_lhc_effect1: Each completed supercollider increases %1 and University science caps by %0%.
arpa_projects_lhc_effect2: Each completed supercollider increases %1 and University science caps by %0%. They also boost warehouse capacity by 5%.
arpa_projects_lhc_effect3: Each completed supercollider increases %1 and University science caps by %0%. They also boost warehouse and garage capacity by 5%.
arpa_projects_lhc_iso1: Each completed supercollider increases %1 science cap by %0%.
arpa_projects_lhc_cataclysm1: Each completed supercollider increases Satellite science cap by %0%.
arpa_projects_lhc_cataclysm2: Each completed supercollider increases Satellite science cap by %0%. They also boost warehouse capacity by 5%.
arpa_projects_lhc_cataclysm3: Each completed supercollider increases Satellite science cap by %0%. They also boost warehouse and garage capacity by 5%.
arpa_projects_stock_exchange_desc: The stock exchange will boost the amount of money your banks can trade in.
arpa_projects_stock_exchange_effect1: Each level of stock exchange will boost %0 capacity by %1%.
arpa_projects_stock_exchange_effect2: Each level of stock exchange will boost %0 capacity by %1% and %2 effectiveness by %3%.
arpa_projects_stock_exchange_effect3: Each level of stock exchange will boost %0 capacity by %1%, %2 effectiveness by %3%, %4 capacity by %5%, and %4 profit by %6%.
arpa_projects_stock_exchange_cataclysm1: Each level of stock exchange will boost %0 money capacity by %1%.
arpa_projects_stock_exchange_cataclysm2: Each level of stock exchange will boost %0 money capacity by %1%, %2 capacity by %3%, and %2 profit by %4%.
arpa_projects_depot_effect: Boosts warehouse capacity by %0%, and increases total crate and container capacity by %1.
arpa_projects_depot_effect_iso: Boosts repository capacity by %0%, and increases total crate and container capacity by %1.
arpa_projects_launch_facility_desc: A launch facility allows for construction and firing of rockets, and thus space exploration.
arpa_projects_launch_facility_msg: A new era of space exploration is now available. Check the civilization tab for new options.
arpa_projects_monument_desc: Construct a monument to your civilization's greatness.
arpa_projects_monument_effect1: Each monument increases maximum morale by %0%.
arpa_projects_railway_desc: Construct a new railway to expand your trade options.
arpa_projects_railway_effect1: Every %2 freight yards increases the number of routes by %3 and each railway improves trade profitability by %1%. Railways are currently adding a total of %0 trade routes each.
arpa_projects_railway_cataclysm1: Every %2 GPS satellites increases the number of routes by %3 and each railway improves trade profitability by %1%. Railways are currently adding a total of %0 trade routes each.
arpa_projects_railway_highway: Increases transport supply to spire by %0% per railway and exports of %1 from %2 by %3%.
arpa_projects_roid_eject_desc: Blast an %0 into the black hole.
arpa_projects_roid_eject_desc2: Blast a %0 into the black hole.
arpa_projects_roid_eject_effect1: Increases the mass of the black hole.
arpa_projects_roid_eject_effect2: Total mass of ejected planetoids %0. Mass of next %2 %1.
arpa_projects_nexus_desc: Construct a magic Nexus to bolster Pylons.
arpa_syphon_desc: A Mana Syphon will breach the veil to suck mana out of the void.
arpa_syphon_desc_warn1: This could irreparably damage the universe.
arpa_syphon_desc_warn2: This is causing irreparable damage to the universe.
arpa_syphon_effect2: The damage done to the fabric of the universe is likely irreversible.
arpa_syphon_effect3: The universe is on the verge of collapse.
arpa_syphon_effect4: The universe is collapsing; you are just accelerating the process at this point.
arpa_syphon_effect_reward: The bubble of true vacuum ripping apart the universe could be worth %0 %3, %1 Phage, and %2 Dark Energy. About %4 Mana Syphons should end things quickly.
arpa_perks_store2: Each Plasmid and Phage increase storage by %0%
arpa_perks_governor: Governors unlocked in Civics tab after researching Governor each run
arpa_perks_challenge2: In non-standard universes, %0% of Standard Mastery and %1% of Universe-specific Mastery works
arpa_perks_challenge3: The Mastery minor trait is unlocked
arpa_perks_mutation1: You can spend Plasmids to remove major racial traits
arpa_perks_mutation2: You can spend Plasmids to remove major & genus racial traits
arpa_perks_mutation3: You can spend Plasmids to gain major racial traits from within the same genus
arpa_perks_unbound_resist: The wrong genus type penalty is reduced to %0%
arpa_genepool_dimensional_warping_desc: Both Phage and Plasmids apply the Spatial Reasoning bonus
arpa_genepool_recombination_desc: Gain a minor trait when evolving
arpa_genepool_homologous_recombination_d: Gain 2 ranks of a second minor trait when evolving
arpa_genepool_genetic_reshuffling_desc: Gain 3 ranks of a third minor trait when evolving
arpa_genepool_recombinant_dna_desc: Gain 4 ranks of a fourth minor trait when evolving
arpa_genepool_chimeric_dna_desc: Gain 5 ranks of a fifth minor trait when evolving
arpa_genepool_molecular_cloning_desc: Gain 6 ranks of a sixth minor trait when evolving
arpa_genepool_transgenes_desc: Gain 7 ranks of a seventh minor trait when evolving
arpa_genepool_synthesis_desc: Gain %0x genes from genome mutation and %1% more from auto sequencing
arpa_genepool_mitosis_desc: Gain increasing Plasmids from each mutation, caps at +%0 per mutation.
arpa_genepool_mutation_desc: Gain the ability to spend Plasmids to remove major racial traits
arpa_genepool_transformation_desc: Gain the ability to spend Plasmids to remove genus racial traits
arpa_genepool_metamorphosis_desc: Gain the ability to spend Plasmids to gain major racial traits from other species of the same genus
arpa_genepool_artificer_desc: Doubles the rate at which crafters work
arpa_genepool_crafting_desc: Crafters produce %0% more product from the same amount of raw materials
arpa_genepool_geographer_desc: Start new games with the build and research queue unlocked
arpa_genepool_architect_desc: Double the maximum number of construction and research projects that can be queued
arpa_genepool_precognition_desc: Allows you to see future techs and queue them
arpa_genepool_governance_desc: Unlock the ability to assign governors to automate some basic tasks
arpa_genepool_civil_service_desc: Upgrade your governors with genes harvested from the best civil servants in history, enabling them to manage more tasks
arpa_genepool_bureaucratic_efficiency_de: Increase the efficiency of governors. They may use up less task slots or have other advanced options and enhanced effects.
arpa_genepool_unlocked_desc: Achievements grant a small production bonus
arpa_genepool_universal_desc: Universe-specific mastery is increased in value
arpa_genepool_standard_desc: 80% of standard mastery works in alternate universes
arpa_genepool_negotiator_desc: Mastery increases volume of goods gained from trade routes
arpa_genepool_haggler_desc: Supercoiled Plasmids increase volume of goods gained from trade routes
arpa_genepool_transcendence_desc: You can unlock both Fanaticism and Anthropology
arpa_genepool_preeminence_desc: You can unlock both Study and Deify
arpa_genepool_bleeding_effect_desc: %0% of Plasmids function in the antimatter universe
arpa_genepool_synchronicity_desc: %0% of Anti-Plasmids function outside the antimatter universe
arpa_genepool_astral_awareness_desc: 20% of Plasmids boost storage in antimatter universe, and 10% of Anti-Plasmids boost storage outside of antimatter universe
arpa_genepool_blood_remembrance_desc: Keep your Blood Stones after a reset
arpa_genepool_blood_sacrifice_desc: Earn double the Blood Stones from clearing Spire levels
arpa_crispr_desc: Permanently alter your DNA. These upgrades carry over across resets.
arpa_blood_purify_desc: Each Spire level completed slightly purifies the miasma around the island, making Purifier, Harbor, Port, and Base Camp creep cheaper.
arpa_blood_chum_desc: Increases the effectiveness of Bireme Warships by +5%.
arpa_blood_lust_desc: Increases the training bonus from boot camps by +0.2%.
arpa_blood_greed_desc: Increases the money storage of banks by +1%.
arpa_blood_attract_desc: Increases the number of souls trapped by Soul Attractors and Ghost Trappers by +5.
arpa_blood_prepared_desc: Add an extra equipment slot to all mechs.
arpa_blood_compact_desc: Standard, Heavy, and Titan class mechs require less bay space. Scout Mechs are cheaper to build.
arpa_blood_infernal_desc: You can optionally construct more expensive versions of your mechs.
arpa_blood_illuminate_desc: Increases the output of Swarm Satellites by +0.01.
arpa_blood_unbound_desc: Can play Aquatic, Fey, Heat, Polar, and Sand races on the wrong biome planets with a penalty.
arpa_blood_shadow_war_desc: Can play Demonic and Angelic races on the wrong biome planets with a penalty.
arpa_blood_unbound_resistance_desc: Reduces the wrong genus type penalty to 10%.
arpa_blood_unbound_immunity_desc: Reduces the wrong genus type penalty to 5%.
arpa_blood_blood_aware_desc: Blood Infusion tab unlocks with A.R.P.A.
arpa_blood_desc: Permanently infuse your DNA. These upgrades carry over across resets.
arpa_boost_label: Enable/Disable genome sequencing boost. Consumes 4x knowledge for 2x sequencing speed boost.
arpa_boost_artifical_label: Enable/Disable compiling code modification. Consumes 4x knowledge for 2x compiling speed boost.
arpa_novo_label: Assemble a Gene for the cost of %0 knowledge.
arpa_novo_artifical_label: Compile a Program for the cost of %0 knowledge.
arpa_mutate_desc: Research beneficial gene mutations. More Bioscience Labs will make this go faster.
arpa_sequence_desc: Sequence your genome. This will unlock the secrets of DNA. More Bioscience Labs will make this go faster.
arpa_modify_desc: Compile beneficial code modifications. More Bioscience Labs will make this go faster.
arpa_decompile_desc: Decompile your source code. This will allow you to modify your base code. More Bioscience Labs will make this go faster.
arpa_gene_buy: Purchase a rank of %0 for %1 %2; ranks purchased with %2 last only for the current species.
arpa_phage_buy: Purchase a rank of %0 for %1 %2; ranks purchased with %2 carry over to all future species.
arpa_remove: Remove %0 from your species; costs %1 %2. This is not easily reversible.
arpa_gain: Add %0 to your species; costs %1 %2. This is not easily reversible.
perks_harmonic: Harmonic Energy is boosting your production by %0% and most storage by %1%.
perks_harmonic2: The %0 and %1 require %2 fewer segments each.
perks_none: You have not unlocked any perks.
race_protoplasm_desc: Your race has yet to evolve into a complex lifeform. Currently you're nothing but protoplasm in the primordial ooze.
race_human_desc: Humans are versatile creatures who are adept at bending the environment around them to suit their needs. They are an ambitious race who seek to expand their knowledge of the universe around them and build great empires.
race_zombie_desc: Zombies aren't so much a species as they are the shambling remains of a race who succumbed to a nightmarish virus. Yet somehow they continue to drone on.
race_elven_desc: Elves are typically tall and slender creatures with pointy ears, that tend to be reclusive but sharp of wit. Elves live long lives and often devote themselves to study, seeking answers to the deep fundamental questions of the universe.
race_xmas_elf_desc: Elves work in the workshop all year round to make toys for everyone. They are basically slave labor used by the red overlord to mass-manufacture his products.
race_orc_desc: Orcs tend to be large and muscular creatures who are slow of wit but contain immense brute strength. They typically try to solve problems with violence first, then seek a more rational solution only when that doesn't work.
